sentences.en: Designing silicon chips to mimic human organs sounds fanciful.
sentences.cn: 设计硅芯片模仿人的器官听上去是异想天开。

sentences.en: He had such a fanciful, pictorial way of saying things.
sentences.cn: 他有一种隐晦曲折 、 光怪陆离的表达方式.

sentences.en: In his ardent eyes the fanciful, lofty joy he experienced was something precious to the extreme.
sentences.cn: 这种快乐,在他的眼里竟然带了一种空幻的 、 崇高的性质.

sentences.en: It was imaginative waistcoat with exceedingly fanciful glass buttons.
sentences.cn: 花哨的坎肩上配搭着一些光怪陆离的玻璃钮扣.

sentences.en: Over the parapet showed quaint and fanciful little buildings.
sentences.cn: 栏杆里有一些古雅精致的小建筑物.

sentences.en: She considered his fear and trembling fanciful and childish.
sentences.cn: 她认为他的恐惧和颤抖是离奇和幼稚的.

sentences.en: She was fanciful, had all sorts of unspoken preferences, and was easily offe nded.
sentences.cn: 她喜欢空想, 有着种种不说出口的偏爱, 因而容易生气.

sentences.en: The economic gloom of the early 1980s was relieved by fanciful architecture.
sentences.cn: 20世纪80年代初期的经济萧条气氛因各种奇异古怪建筑的出现而有所缓解。

sentences.en: The fanciful panda fan panics over the span of the pan - like panel.
sentences.cn: 爱幻想的熊猫迷对盆 状 仪表板的全长感到恐慌.

sentences.en: The floors were laid in fanciful figures wrought in mosaics of many - coloured marbles.
sentences.cn: 地上都有五彩云石镶嵌的怪兽异禽.

sentences.en: The modern poets have gone back to the fanciful poems of the metaphysical poets of the seventeenth century for many of their images.
sentences.cn: 现代派诗人就其许多想象又回到了十七世纪极抽象派诗人的意象诗中.

sentences.en: The suggestion that there was a conspiracy is not entirely fanciful.
sentences.cn: 说有人在搞阴谋，这并不完全是臆想。

sentences.en: The work was subtle, remote, fanciful - a snow scene with purple edges.
sentences.cn: 作品是微妙的, 冷僻的, 幻想的一幅带紫边的雪景.

sentences.en: The wreaths of smoke curled up in such fanciful whorls from his opiumtainted cigarette.
sentences.cn: 这些烟圈出自他那带鸦片味的香烟头,形成各种光怪陆离的涡状花纹而袅袅上升.

sentences.en: They offered a reasoned approach in place of the fanciful and uncritical accounts of the poets.
sentences.cn: 他们用合理化的解释来代替诗人的想象和不加分析的传说.

words.tran_cn: 空想的；虚构的；受喜爱的；被特别爱好的
想象的；奇特的；昂贵的；精选的

trans.tran_cn: （指人）富于幻想的，（指物）设计或装饰新颖奇特的，奇怪的，稀奇的，不现实
trans.tran_en: imagined rather than based on facts – often used to show disapproval
